title: Wavemill configuration
description: Per-repo (.wavemill-config.json) or user-level (~/.wavemill/config.json) config. All fields are optional; env vars override everything.

project.description: Linear project name for backlog queries. Empty string means all projects.

baseBranch.description: Base branch for worktrees and PR targets.

worktreeRoot.description: Directory for git worktrees. Relative paths resolve against the repo root.

agentCmd.description: Agent CLI to use. Built-in support for 'claude' and 'codex'. Other CLIs work via generic tmux passthrough. Can be overridden with --agent flag or AGENT_CMD env var.

requireConfirm.description: Whether to prompt for confirmation before launching tasks.

planningMode.description: How to handle the planning phase. 'interactive' launches Claude in tmux for user-guided planning before implementation. 'skip' goes straight to autonomous implementation (current default behavior).

maxRetries.description: Max retry attempts for failed API calls.

retryDelay.description: Initial retry delay in seconds (doubles on each retry).

maxSelect.description: Maximum issues that can be selected for expansion.

maxDisplay.description: Maximum candidate issues shown in the selection list.
Maximum initiatives shown in the selection list.

research.description: When true, always run the research phase before plan decomposition. Can be overridden by the --research CLI flag.

evalsDir.description: Directory for persisting eval result JSONL files. Relative paths resolve against the repo root.

judge.description: LLM judge configuration for eval scoring.

model.description: Model ID for the eval judge (e.g. 'claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929', 'claude-haiku-4-5-20251001').

provider.description: LLM provider for the eval judge. Currently only 'anthropic' is supported.

pricing.description: Per-model pricing table for cost estimation. Keys are model identifiers, values specify cost per million tokens.

inputCostPerMTok.description: Cost in USD per million input tokens.

outputCostPerMTok.description: Cost in USD per million output tokens.

cacheWriteCostPerMTok.description: Cost in USD per million cache creation (write) input tokens. Defaults to 1.25x inputCostPerMTok.

cacheReadCostPerMTok.description: Cost in USD per million cache read input tokens. Defaults to 0.1x inputCostPerMTok.

interventionPenalties.description: Penalty weights per intervention type. Each value is the score penalty (0-1) applied per occurrence of that intervention type.

reviewComment.description: Penalty per PR review comment requesting changes.

postPrCommit.description: Penalty per commit made after the initial PR creation.

manualEdit.description: Penalty per manual file edit (commit not attributed to the agent).

testFix.description: Penalty per interactive test fix detected in commit messages.

autoEval.description: When true, automatically run eval after workflow/bugfix command completion (PR creation). Eval failures are logged as warnings and never fail the workflow.

router.description: Settings for the prompt-to-model router that suggests the best LLM for a task based on historical eval data.

enabled.description: Enable model routing suggestions before workflow execution.

defaultModel.description: Fallback model when insufficient eval data exists for routing.

minRecords.description: Minimum total eval records required before the router makes suggestions.

minModels.description: Minimum distinct models with eval data before routing is active.

models.description: Candidate model IDs the router may recommend. Empty array means all models found in eval data.
